title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Unusual interests persistently tickle the periphery of your attention today. Even when you are fully immersed in practical affairs, part of your mind seizes every opportunity to drift toward invention, the paranormal, or a favorite hobby. You might even be inspired to dig more deeply into the subject or activity thats igniting your passion. The offbeat is calling your name, but you may struggle to find the time to answer. Thankfully, handling your daily chores with efficiency gives you the chance to fall down the rabbit hole of your delight. Curiosity is the seed of enlightenment. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
